context_bundle.summary: OpenTelemetry provides a set of standardized, vendor-agnostic tools and APIs for creating, collecting, and exporting telemetry data

onboarding.quick_start: helm install opentelemetry-collector open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector --namespace observability --set mode=deployment && kubectl apply -f instrumentation.yaml
common_patterns: Receivers configuration: 'otlp:' with 'endpoint: 0.0.0.0:4317' for gRPC and 'endpoint: 0.0.0.0:4318' for HTTP
Processors: 'batch:' with 'timeout: 1s send_batch_size: 1024' for efficient data processing
Exporters: 'otlphttp:' with 'endpoint: http://jaeger:14268/api/traces' for trace export
known_errors: Collector not receiving: 'netstat -tlnp | grep 4317' and verify receiver configuration and endpoints
Memory high: 'kubectl top pods -n observability' and adjust batch processor configuration
Data loss: 'curl http://otel-collector:8888/metrics' and check export failures and retry policies
Agent installation failed: Verify OpenTelemetry SDK version compatibility and auto-instrumentation paths
Schema conflicts: 'otelcol_config validate' to check receiver/exporter configuration syntax
